data.what_is:
GoCRM is a CRM platform designed and developed entirely in-house as the only CRM to deliver a full-funnel marketing approach. 

GoCRM combines powerful marketing and sales features into a customizable and fully integrated platform. Our platform is easy to use and affordable for small businesses. 

This means you get a robust platform that supports scalable business growth, streamlines sales processes, and enhances the overall customer experience.
data.product_description:
GoCRM is a customer relationship management solution that takes on a full-funnel approach by combining powerful marketing and sales features. This means you get a robust platform that supports scalable business growth, streamlines sales processes, and enhances the overall customer experience.

GoCRM lets you:

* Gain insights about your customer base.
* Identify your most promising prospects & leads.
* Track your deals and progress with a visual sales pipeline.
* Automate repetitive tasks and optimize your workflow.
* Increase sales performance with real-time updates.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Get a modern CRM with built-in email and calling at an unbeatable value.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GoCRM?
It is best for the following services: Home Builders, Real Estate, Mortgage, Insurance, Credit Repair, Funeral Homes, Solar, HVAC, Financial Adviser, Security Systems, Pest Control, IT Software, Automotive.

What do you dislike about GoCRM?
Didn't found any specific cons yet. Will share if found any.

Recommendations to others considering GoCRM:
Recommended if the following features are required:
Contact Management
Call Logging
Product Catalog
Lead Scoring
Project Management
Marketing Automation
Customer Support
List Management

What problems is GoCRM solving and how is that benefiting you?
It offers the following features which are the great benefits:
Contact Management
Call Logging
Product Catalog
Lead Scoring
Project Management
Marketing Automation
Customer Support
List Management

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GoCRM?
Since GOCRM, the productivity of each salesperson has went up ! the csv import helps a lot

What do you dislike about GoCRM?
we cannot import contacts from google contacts, which is the primary source of contact data for us.

What problems is GoCRM solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Built in call feature is a savior, helps cut costs and improves quality.
